content.rendered:
Directed by Prashanth Neel.

Written by M Chandramouli. Raaghav Vinay Shivagange. Prashanth Neel. Prashanth Neel. Shivgopal Krishna. Sanjay Upadhyay.

Cast Yash(Rocky / Raja Krishnappa Bairya). Srinidhi Shetty(Reena). Ramachandra Raju(Garuda). Archana Jois(Gangamma / Rocky’s Mother). Anant Nag(Anand Ingalagi). Vasishta N. Simha(Kamal). Achyuth Kumar(Guru Pandyan). Srinivasa Murthy(Narayan). Balakrishna(Inayath Khalil). Lakshmipathi(Huccha). Ramesh Indhira(Sooryavardhan). Harish Rai(Khasim). Dinesh Mangaluru(Shetty). Ayyappa P. Sharma(Vanaram). Krishnappa(Old Man). Anmol Vijay Bhatkal(Young Rocky). Malavika Avinash(Deepa Hegde). Joy Badlani(Bhadhra). Neenasam Ashwath(Kulkarni (as Ninasam Ashwath)). Siam Howlader((voice)). B.S. Avinash(Andrews). Lakki Lakshman(Rajendra Desai). T.S. Nagabharana(News Channel Owner). Tarak Ponnappa(Daya (as Tharak Ponnappa)). Roopa Rayappa(Shanti). Puneeth Rudranag(Rugga). Sampath(Ramesh). Ashok Sharma(Young Anand Ingalagi). Tamannaah Bhatia(Milky). Mouni Roy(Lucy) .Ajith.Akash.Anji.Arun. Aryadev(Aslam). Backagaindancer(Raman).Usha Bhandary. Vinay Bidappa(Virat).Dabhar. Amar Kumar Dang(Villian).Devaraj.Sougata Ghosh. Govinde Gowda(Office Assistant). Md Amir Hamja(Villen (as a different name)).Hemanth.Hruthvik.Jogi. Mohan Juneja(Informer).Karthik. John Kokken(John).Kamrul Hossain Mihir. Nagesh(Ramana).Naren.Naveen.Naveendra.Robayet Hossain Ovi.Dhool Prakash.Prasanna. Vikash Rajput(Vikash Rajput).Ugramm Ravi.Jaguar Sannappa.Satish.Seendhe. Anmol Sharma(Raja (as Anmol)). Harsh Shashwat(Digital Partner). Shekar(Deelavar). Yash Shetty(Shyam).Shyam. B. Suresh(Vittal). Tamanna aktar Toma((voice)).Uma. Vinay(Virat).Farsi Zaman

Languages Kannada. English. Hindi.

Producers Karthik Gowda. Hetvi Karia. Vijay Kiragandur. K.V. Rama Rao.

Production Hombale Films.
